summary: The implementation successfully delivers all 8 requirements for manual Bitcoin transaction verification. Backend methods (submitVerificationRequest, approveVerificationRequest, rejectVerificationRequest) are implemented in backend/main.mo with proper status tracking and admin controls. Frontend includes user verification page at /verify-transaction with form and history table, admin verification requests page at /admin/verification-requests with approve/reject actions, navigation links in both user and admin sections, and all required React Query hooks in useQueries.ts. All acceptance criteria appear to be met based on the diff evidence.

hallucinated_features.description: Admin comment field for approval actions
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-4 specifies that both methods should record the admin principal who processed the request, but does not mention recording comments. The implementation adds optional comment parameter to approveVerificationRequest and required comment to rejectVerificationRequest.
REQ-3 requests a table showing verification requests with approve/reject actions, but does not specify filtering capabilities by status.

hallucinated_features.description: Statistics cards showing pending/approved/rejected counts on AdminVerificationRequestsPage
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-3 specifies showing a table with approve/reject buttons but does not request summary statistics or count displays.
